original_text: But I did not believe these things until I came and saw with my own eyes. Indeed, not even half was told me; in wisdom and wealth you have far exceeded the report I heard.
korean_text: 내가 그 말들을 믿지 아니하였더니 이제 와서 친히 본즉 내게 말한 것은 절반도 못되니 당신의 지혜와 복이 내가 들은 소문보다 더하도다

sentences.original_text: But I did not believe these things
until I came and saw with my own eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 직접 와서 내 눈으로 보기까지는

sentences.original_text: Indeed, not even half was told me
sentences.korean_translation: 정말, 내게 들은 것은 절반도 되지 않았다

sentences.original_text: you have far exceeded the report I heard
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 들은 보고를 훨씬 초월했다
